10520313452757123850.Text: M'nashi was my assistant!  He helped me make my candy!  He so loved his sugar, M'nashi did.  Loved it a little too much, I'm afraid!  He died, you see.  His, ah, sweet tooth got the better of him.  I buried him, just outside.  We had a lovely little ceremony.  The horkers came and sang for him, they did!  He he he!  Ha ha ha ha ha!
